root.name: Tower Bloxx Deluxe
root.description: OverviewTower Bloxx Deluxe, originally premiered on the iPhone but was released for Xbox Live Arcade on October 21, 2009. The game is controlled using only one button, the gameplay focuses the deployment of floors of buildings, each time a floor is added it becomes increasingly difficult to keep the structure straight as the tower grows taller it sways from side to side. Your ability to successfully drop floors quickly will earn you more residents. ModesBuild City - Allows you to plan four districts in your town Quick Game - Build the highest tower possible Time Attack - Building the highest tower possible with time allotted Multiplayer The game features three different multiplayer options, Time Attack, Battle and Co-Op.
